text: A3. Others have posted lists of side effects already. I dose 1 of #COVID19 #vaccine w/ just mild arm soreness for 1/2 a day. My husband @gleeson_md had both doses. Watch video of his dose 1 & 2 experiences here: https://t.co/hkOkBJPDPt & here: https://t.co/qzDmhS09C9. #AskReuters https://t.co/OcaDVTqYvv
